live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47806.summary: Some customers in Michipicoten and Wawa are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47806.title: Mar 22 - Michipicoten and Wawa | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
